I was a little disappointed that the first time I tried to use the discount, the employees didn't know how to do it and told me I had to come back to do it when a specific manager was in. I would probably just give a straight up donation next time as this is probably more trouble than its worth. You may want to work with your vendors on redemption processes.

Review.Titre: My only complaint would be that you couldn't get donations less than $35
Review.Contenu: My only complaint would be that, with friends and family out of town that couldn't use the discount food card, someone couldn't donate less than a monetary amount $35.  My daughter had a handful of people that would have been willing to donate $5 or $10 but couldn't afford $35.

Review.Titre: How about “other” for donation dollars…
Review.Contenu: How about “other” for donation dollars not all senior citizens can afford your minimum amount , we feel it’s kinda ballsy for you to set minimum at $35.00

Review.Titre: Convenient
Review.Contenu: This is a very convenient way to raise funds but would prefer to just do a straight donation to organization and not pay fees.  It would also be great if you would add a paypal option.  I prefer not to give out my credit card information.

Review.Titre: Remove Minimum Donation Amount
Review.Contenu: I did not like that there was a minimum amount if I simply wanted to make a donation.  I bought a card from my daughter but wanted to donate $10 to two of her friends as well but was not able to as the minimum donation amount was $25 and I did not want to spend an additional $50.

Review.Titre: Bad minimum donation requirement
Review.Contenu: I didn't care for the minimum donation being a fixed amount of $35.  I also would have preferred being able to access the account as a helper without having to load an app.  We also have older family members who do not have a smartphone so it made their ordering more difficult.

Review.Titre: I don’t think that it should be counted…
Review.Contenu: I don’t think that it should be counted by supporters but on how much they bought/donated. The fact that someone could donate $200 would count the same as someone who bought a box of cookies is not right.

Review.Titre: I enjoy supporting my daughter's…
Review.Contenu: I enjoy supporting my daughter's volleyball team for Hamilton High School.  The assortment of cookie dough is great, and the cookies are delicious!!!  The only part that is hard for my daughter is the points she receives for the donations.  She receives 1 point for each order or each donation.  She needed 30 points to earn a jacket.  She has family on the east coast, so they help with donations.  She received a few donations at $100.00  This is great, but she only receives 1 point for this sum.  I wish the company or school would look at the total amount earned instead of 1 point per person or order.  Something to think about in the future.

Review.Titre: Credits for Donations….Needs to Change
Review.Contenu: The credit for donations needs to be adjusted. You can’t ask someone for a donation and then tell them how to do it. You can’t say in your message that if you decide to give me money instead of purchasing the item, please enter your donation in smaller increments multiple times so I get more credit. Everyone else in the fundraiser gets the same profit I assume, except for the participant who is having to do all the asking and selling. That’s not fair to the child. A $35 donation and a $100 donation should not be worth the same number of credits. If for example the item being sold cost $20 then someone that gives $100 should count for 5 credits. You should also allow someone to enter a donation amount in case they want to contribute but can’t give at least $35. A $5 donation is still appreciated and helpful.Goals should be based on a total $$ amount and not units.

Review.Titre: Gift wrapping paper. Things that are useful or could be given as presentsGet more items to choose from
Review.Contenu: Get more items to choose from, pricing for less fortunate families with lower income may help get more supporters

Review.Titre: Good, bad experience
Review.Contenu: It was easy enough to follow the link and click and buy products to support the kids. I liked that part. The bad part was I was getting numerous non-personal texts which were obviously coming from an automated system. Where is the personal contact? The personal touch? And I supported one player, which is all I could afford. I kept getting texts from two others. Repeatedly. There needs to be a system in place for us to kindly decline.

Review.Titre: Not useful to the older generation
Review.Contenu: Doing fundraisers all on an app is not the best for all the older relatives, neighbors and friends that are not tech savvy. We lost a lot of our usual supporters doing it all on a phone. Also - no fair on the extra fee, very much NOT appreciated to charge people who are supporting us a FEE.

Review.Titre: Minimum
Review.Contenu: You would have collected more money if you lowered your minimum.  I personally know people who would have contributed if the minimum was less than $35.

Review.Titre: Misleading text requests
Review.Contenu: Misleading text requests: I kept getting texts that looked like they were coming from my cousin, but when I responded it said the number was not set up for response (or something like that). That felt misleading. This happened more than once. I am happy to donate but would have preferred to deal directly with the person I was donating to. As well, I'd like a receipt for my donation but I don't see how to get one other than the credit card charge.

Review.Titre: I did not like the interference of…
Review.Contenu: I did not like the interference of other ads. There should be a direct link to the specific place or company that your funds are going to and I didn't have that experience. I am a semi-literate computer user, so I can navigate quite well.

Review.Titre: This option was good for me as my…
Review.Contenu: This option was good for me as my grandchild lives a distance from us.  I perfer donations to buying items.  One thing I didn't care for was the lowest option for donating was $35, I would have liked a $25 option since I have more than one grandchild who bring me fundraisers.

Review.Titre: Mixed Feelings
Review.Contenu: Using Molly Dolly made the fundraiser a little easier, but ultimately I felt uncomfortable with the automated texts that generated without my initiation or me giving the ok. Some of my friends felt the texts were Spam and impersonal.

Review.Titre: Disappointed
Review.Contenu: I didn’t like this year the students gain of a jacket was in the second request. Once they had there contacts give for the school then for the jacket, it should have been reversed.  The kids play the game and take the beating they should have been able to qualify for a jacket.  It was hard to get a second donation so soon. Also too many notices sent once a donation was given.

Review.Titre: We have several people that wanted to…
Review.Contenu: We have several people that wanted to donate to our son but was dissatisfied with not having an option to choose a custom amount to donate…. So instead of have several less than $35 donations he ended up with none

Review.Titre: Annoying Follow On Texts
Review.Contenu: I was annoyed to get multiple follow up texts after contributing in response to the first one.  Your software needs a better filter for follow up texts!!!

Review.Titre: customer service…
Review.Contenu: I liked the customer service which was quuck and responsive. Wasn't impressed who you partnered with to get items out to customers. Also didn't like the delay in notification that item was out of stock. I had to email you to find out.

Review.Titre: Specified locations - live out of state
Review.Contenu: As I live out of the area, I chose the discount card option and after purchase seen it’s specific to the Dallas area. It didn’t say beforehand that it was specified locations so please at that before purchase as I could’ve just donated instead.

Review.Titre: Lump sum donations should automatically…
Review.Contenu: Lump sum donations should automatically be separated into units so the students  earn credits towards their goals. The donee should not be responsible for making numerous donations to benefit the students required minimum. Thanks

Review.Titre: Potentially great but needs changes
Review.Contenu: It has the potential to be a great app with some simple upgrades. It offers a lot of offers and you can access multiple cards. But this is mitigated that there is no way to search or sort through the offers. So the avalanche of options becomes a liability, rather than an asset. You should be able to search by name, sort A-Z and/or search based on your location and which offers are closest to you. Those would make it a 5 star app.

Review.Titre: Easy to donate
Review.Contenu: Liked the easy of making my donation. Disliked the fact there was limited items to chose from to purchase. Disliked that I couldn't pick the amount I wanted to donated. It was set at a minimum of $35. Maybe I could only do $10, why not give me that option.

Review.Titre: I didn’t realize when we upload…
Review.Contenu: I didn’t realize when we upload contacts that it would repeatedly send out reminders to people. I think one text was sufficient. We had multiple people call and ask why they were getting texts once a week. It almost looks like we are hounding them for money and that isn’t ok.

Review.Titre: The general idea of doing this online…
Review.Contenu: The general idea of doing this online is great.  I did not like the idea that I could not put in a dollar amount less than $25. Maybe I want to give something but couldn't afford the full $25 plus fee of credit card - then nothing could be donated

Review.Titre: Limited choices
Review.Contenu: Well, i wish that the product choices were more variety because some supporters did not order anything due to the limited availability. Hope this helps.

Review.Titre: CONVENIENT BUT CHANGES NEEDED
Review.Contenu: I did like the convenience of the link, however, I do NOT like the minimum $35 donation amount. That's alot of money. I feel like we lost out on donations because of that minimum. I also do NOT agree with donors being charged a fee to donate. We've fundraised in the past with no problems. This was not as successful for us.

Review.Titre: Useless Coupons unless you live in Mobile
Review.Contenu: Coupons are only able to be redeemed in Mobile AL.. Useless for us. However, I am happy to donate regardless of a reimbursement.

Review.Titre: As a chairperson for our school’s…
Review.Contenu: As a chairperson for our school’s Easter sale, I found a few cons to the app.  The most inconvenient aspect was requiring a different phone number and email address for each student.  This was difficult for parents of multiple students, especially when needing to receive and enter a verification code every time you logged in.  I had my chairperson account but then needed to use my husband’s phone number for my daughter’s account and could only login if he was around to give me the verification code.The second thing I wasn’t fond of was the ranking system.  We typically choose our top sellers by dollar amount and not the number of units sold, it would be nice if you could choose how you would like them to be ranked.  Also, for the team rankings, if a student signed up but didn’t sell anything, that significantly dropped the team’s average number of units.  They’re better off just not registering.  The ranking system just didn’t seem “fair”.

Review.Titre: Units should be less
Review.Contenu: I feel that units should be ten or five bucks since twenty five is allot but overall I liked the experience and another thing is that the apps sends messages to other people without you knowing which bothered other people

Review.Titre: I  only bought the discount card to…
Review.Contenu: I  only bought the discount card to help my grandson in the band.  I rarely go out so I wanted to give the card to him so his family could enjoy it.  However, there was no way to do that.  Plus downloading it was complicated for me.

Review.Titre: Annoying fundraiser.
Review.Contenu: Your organization or app sent out messages too many times to our friends and relatives related to this fundraiser and it became annoying for them.   Will never support this particular fundraiser again.

Review.Titre: I like that I am able to donate to the…
Review.Contenu: I like that I am able to donate to the fundraiser easily being far from the person that is fundraising.  What I dislike was that the cards only had 2 places that I could patron.  The other is the $3 fee to donate to the fundraiser, it seems a bit high and if the person the fundraiser was for hadn't been family I would not have donated at all.

Review.Titre: It was easy to make the donation but…
Review.Contenu: It was easy to make the donation but the donated party ignored questions. This entitled ingratitude has soured me on the whole donate online thing. I won't do it again.

Review.Titre: New experience
Review.Contenu: I think it is a great way to raise money, but maybe starting the donation amount a little lower. I think the kids would get more, because you have to think about lower income families or families on one income. I know we got that feed back from som that we were try to have donate.

Review.Titre: okay but not great
Review.Contenu: Did it make the fundraiser easier? Yes it did.But, they take 65 -70% of the food order and charge a fee on top of that. Ok, it's food I can see that to a point. But they take 20% of the cash donations! AND charge a fee on top of that! 20% for doing what! Next time I'll just ask for Venmo or pay pal, save me and the donator money. Plus I had a issue with my account and profile, and they never got back to me. Is it okay, but there has to be better ones out there for next time.

Review.Titre: It was difficult for me to use
Review.Contenu: It was difficult for me to use.  I had to call the coach at NEW Lutheran for help getting my cards which I have not received yet. Duh why send out the survey before receiving a product. To me it was not easy.  Sorry. Not sure the date I went online to order this.

Review.Titre: It was nice to be able to get donations…
Review.Contenu: It was nice to be able to get donations and sell things however there wasn’t much to choose from and it was all very confusing

Review.Titre: Hard to use because you have to open…
Review.Contenu: Hard to use because you have to open app.  Cards had a quick easy list of participants and offers, tedious to use electronic system.  My mother in law doesn’t have a smartphone and can’t use.

Review.Titre: Review
Review.Contenu: It said I had 18 hours left and then it disappeared.   I had a few that were going to purchase but didn't get paid till Friday.  If they didn't buy i was going to get the last two for him a shirt.   Also many didn't like purchasing on line so they gave me the money and I had to purchase and had to eat the credit card fees.  Didn't like those fees.  Others were asking if there were other things to purchase besides the card.  I guess it was a pretty good fundraiser.  Hope they did well.

Review.Titre: I did not like the outrageous fees that…
Review.Contenu: I did not like the outrageous fees that you charge! Also the constant reminder of giving donations.

Review.Titre: I did not like the fact that every item…
Review.Contenu: I did not like the fact that every item was charged a shipping fee when it was all shipped in the same box. I will not order again because of this. The product was good but that was not.

Review.Titre: I do not like the fees for the service
Review.Contenu: I do not like the fees for the service. If it's a donation ALL of the money should go towards the foundation, fees should not be charged for something like this. It makes it hard for people who really want to support the most they can.

Review.Titre: there should be an option to sell paper…
Review.Contenu: there should be an option to sell paper cards in place of the electronic cards. By not having paper cards, there is a large percentage of the older population that opts not to participate in the fundraiser due to not being able to have a paper coupon that they can present at the participating businesses.

Review.Titre: Too expensive of 1 item of clothing…
Review.Contenu: Too expensive of 1 item of clothing choice. No secondary product like popcorn to choose or I would've sold more.

Review.Titre: I didn’t like the fact that they…
Review.Contenu: I didn’t like the fact that they charged a fee for every donation, I purchased 4 $35 donations and they charged me $2+ for each even though I purchased them together.

Review.Titre: Donation
Review.Contenu: There should be more donation options for supporters who may not want to purchase but want to support

Review.Titre: I enjoy donating I don’t know what the…
Review.Contenu: I enjoy donating I don’t know what the $1.50 charge was for I rather it went towards my donation instead of a fee.

Review.Titre: Confusing Purchase Options
Review.Contenu: Did not like the fact that you could “donate” or buy a card but the value of each “unit” differed, according to which you chose!

Review.Titre: There are way too many notifications…
Review.Contenu: There are way too many notifications sent out. I was getting emails and text messages one after the other about this program. I think the program is a good one but there are too many messages.

Review.Titre: Can’t trust the automation
Review.Contenu: I liked the automaton but I couldn’t trust it. I uploaded the contacts from my phone and selected the contacts to include, however, the system sent it out to all my contacts.

Review.Titre: Not sure if it can be trusted
Review.Contenu: I didn't like that when I uploaded my contacts and went through them and clicked on the ones I wanted to send out somehow all of them got sent a text from me.

Review.Titre: Like the actual wildcat card better..
Review.Contenu: Like the actual wildcat card better... to me personally this is not convenient carrying phone around and having to pull up app to use the rewards

Review.Titre: Unfortunately I didn’t receive my order…
Review.Contenu: Unfortunately I didn’t receive my order out of state.  The host of fundraiser made me aware that she received the cookies and offered to send them to me.  I just stated she could keep them and serve them to her guests.

Review.Titre: I would have liked an option to donate…
Review.Contenu: I would have liked an option to donate an amount lower than $35.00. It would have been nice to have the option to donate any amount. It was very discouraging that the large donation amount still only counted as one unit

Review.Titre: Multiple impersonal emails /texts
Review.Contenu: Multiple impersonal emails /texts. Would be nice if the kids actually reach out to ask and provide a personal thank you.

Review.Titre: Like & Dislike
Review.Contenu: Like:I like that I supporting a good worthy cause … White River Hornets Football player. And you gets something back at the same time.Dislike:The sponsors keeps changing their deals or canceling completely. I waited to use the deals for 2023 and now there’s not to much to use.Would be nice if the sponsors keep it as is .

Review.Titre: Great fundraising idea but two issues
Review.Contenu: Great fundraising idea but two issues: - Improve product selection options and- Too many “follow-up” requests auto generated

Review.Titre: I am still waiting for my order
Review.Contenu: I am still waiting for my order, and cannot figure out how to track the package. Not sure if it is even sent??Thank you for following up, that is great customer service! I will be waiting for the email to track. Thanks again for your time.

Review.Titre: No bar code or coupon code or number…
Review.Contenu: No bar code or coupon code or number for the discount, so businesses’ employees are not sure how to input discounts at checkout.

Review.Titre: Great app with a few tweaks
Review.Contenu: I think it was great that you could order right through text. Made it very convenient. I think $30 being the minimum amount may have been high for some families. It would be nice if there was a $20 option. It also would be nice if the donations received more unit points. I gave $100 but it only got one unit which was the same as pretzels at $29.99. My son could have reached his goal of 30 units easier had the units of donation been split up differently. It would have been nice to have an easy way to go door to door as well. My son really wanted to hit 30 units but ran out of contacts to connect with. Having a way to reach strangers would have been nice too.

Review.Titre: I don't love that this is all online
Review.Contenu: I don't love that this is all online. My son had trouble with messages sent automatically.

Review.Titre: Id rather have card in hand' easier…
Review.Contenu: Id rather have card in hand' easier accessability.Easier to give to someone else.Ive never used because of it

Review.Titre: Too many texts
Review.Contenu: The contacts that were not interested in donated complained of being sent texts repeatedly. There should be a way for them to opt out.

Review.Titre: They can improve by putting an actual…
Review.Contenu: They can improve by putting an actual coupon code on the card so that the restaurants know how to use the card.

Review.Titre: Discounts are great
Review.Contenu: Discounts are great. Having card on phone is a major drawback. We could have sold more but a lot of older people don’t use their phone for something like this.

Review.Titre: Just ok
Review.Contenu: Product was expensive for what you got. No option to donate less than $35 unless you buy something first and then add on a donation of any amount.

Review.Titre: I normally do not pay the processing…
Review.Contenu: I normally do not pay the processing fee associated with a contribution.  I did not have the option.

Review.Titre: Good and Bad
Review.Contenu: It was very easy to do. The only negative of the whole deal was after paying I noticed a 6 dollar fee. I think it is a very sad thing when a company has to force profits from generous people thinking they supporting a school.

Review.Titre: I was disappointed that after I had…
Review.Contenu: I was disappointed that after I had purchased two of the cards my husband started receiving texts asking for a donation. We feel it was a scam? Said there was only 24 hours to reach the goal and to my knowledge it was already closed. My grandson said he did not send it. The return number was 385-489-5530

Review.Titre: Easy to use
Review.Contenu: Easy to use. I did not lik that fact that if you wanted to make a donation, you had to make a minimum of $20. If I wanted to donate less I was not able to and that caused me to not donate an amount at all.

Review.Titre: The app made everything easily…
Review.Contenu: The app made everything easily accessible and helped me be able to see what was going on with my little circle.

Review.Titre: Experience was good.
Review.Contenu: Experience was good.. reason I rated it 4 stars instead of 5 is because there is no option for a custom donation. I think more people would have donated to this if they had an option to select how much they wished to donate instead of a set amount. While $35 is not a lot of money it may be alot for some to give.

Review.Titre: experience was good
Review.Contenu: experience was good. This fundraiser would be better and rate 5 stars if donors were given the option to customize their donation rather than be forced to give at least $35.00. While that is not a whole lot of money, it could be more than some  people can afford to give. A custom donation would be great.

Review.Titre: Great experience.
Review.Contenu: Having a couple purchase items along with donation choices is terrific.  However, a few friends and family members wanted to donate, but $35 was out of their budget.  Had their been a $25 option we may have had a few more supporters.

Review.Titre: Family Day Raffle
Review.Contenu: While the site was easy for us to navigate, older family members prefer buying actual tickets.  We forwarded the link to a few people who normally support the Family Day raffle and none of them bought tickets this year.

Review.Titre: Super easy to set up and run not much…
Review.Contenu: Super easy to set up and run not much work needed. We are out of season which is the only reason it isnt 5 stars, I wish that there was some sort of group message within the app to message all of our own participants.

Review.Titre: I am a busy man
Review.Contenu: I am a busy man . . . Period! When you step into my world, you are on my time which I do not have much of! Y’all made donating easy and meaningful. And you did not waste my valuable time. . . HALLELUYAH

Review.Titre: It was great to have the online option…
Review.Contenu: It was great to have the online option so friends and family out of state could support without having to rely on mail to get delivered. It would have been nice if anyone who donated more than the minimum $20 could have also gotten the gold card for the discounts. Also an option for an "other" amount to donate instead of selected donation amounts.

Review.Titre: Great avenue for donating
Review.Contenu: Great avenue for donating!  Simple to use and quick while enabling the user to personalize.   May want to make incomplete info areas more evident.   I kept hitting the submit button but couldn't advance.  Close look, I had neglected to enter my zip.  If that area would have been highlighted, it would have been easier to understand what was missing.

Review.Titre: It was so easy
Review.Contenu: It was so easy! The only thing I wish I would have known ahead of time was to encourage people to break out their donations into smaller denominations so more units could be attained.

Review.Titre: Offer options
Review.Contenu: We should be able to input the amount of donations we want to offer. I like that I received an email copy of my receipt.

Review.Titre: Light of the World
Review.Contenu: It was a good experience. The representative was a great help and very motivating. We are great full for his patients and help throughout the process. It was a pleasure working with MoneyDolly. Thanks for everything.               Light of the World Christian                   Center

Review.Titre: Overall great fundraiser
Review.Contenu: Overall great fundraiser. They only thing I would want different is to be able to see the comments from donors through the personal page. The only way I was able to see them was to go in as though I were making a donation.

Review.Titre: Easy to use interface
Review.Contenu: Easy to use interface. Would have liked to be able to specify my own dollar amount, or have options less than $40.

Review.Titre: I was able to participate for my granddaughter
Review.Contenu: I was able to participate for my granddaughter and this process was easy and user friendly. We appreciate and support our family.

Review.Titre: Excellent customer service
Review.Contenu: Excellent customer service. There should be a physical card option. It’s difficult to require someone to download an app. If they’re nice enough to donate, we shouldn’t give them a job.

Review.Titre: Fabulous....with one issue
Review.Contenu: I love the digital format for the ease and because our relatives & friends across the country can participate. Card Connection is a fabulous feature! I do have a couple critiques regarding the donation side. First, I think it should allow for custom amounts rather than flat and the minimum should be the same price as the card. Second, each increment of a donation equal to a card purchase ($15 card or $15 donation) should equal 1 unit. For example, if I buy 2 cards, the player earns 2 units. But if I make a $35 donation he only earns one. Doesn't seem fair so we just had our customers buy the number of cards that would equal the amount they wanted to donate.

Review.Titre: Very easy process
Review.Contenu: Thank you for a great experience.  It was an easy process. I did not understand using "units" as a goal. The fundraiser was to reach an overall amount of money that was needed to cover costs for our children.  Don't think it matters if it comes from 1 person or 20.  Again, it was very easy, so thanks for that.

Review.Titre: I'm  honored to be able to support…
Review.Contenu: I'm  honored to be able to support Hampton High school with their fund raisers. MoneyDolly makes purchasing easy and simple.

Review.Titre: I liked the fundraiser……….
Review.Contenu: I liked the fundraiser because they had some items for sale, although I would have liked some more personalized item to choose from. Other than that I loved this fundraiser.

Review.Titre: Money Dolly Growing Pains
Review.Contenu: I am nearing 70 years old, so I am a "tad" (bolded, exclamation points) challenged with technology.  So, once I downloaded the app. and got the Bison Wrestling Team's discount card up and running, I tried it at two different Great Falls locations.  A Holiday gas station.  And Sonic drive up.  Perhaps my "confirm" wasn't pressed at the correct time.  It wouldn't work at either location, so I figure one must be face to face with the business person in order to get it to cooperate.  Stay tuned.

Review.Titre: Loved the program and ease of use
Review.Contenu: Loved the program and ease of use! However, grandparents who wanted to donate with cash were unable and others were irritated they couldn’t set the minimum amount to donate.  Not everyone who wants to donate can afford to donate that much but would have been able to donate $15 or so.

Review.Titre: Northwoodl Falcons Football Fundraiser 2023
Review.Contenu: I enjoyed this experience with money dolly because she didn't have to go through a whole lot of steps I thought. Always enjoy helping my grandchildren and all their sports events and this will help a lot especially you don't have to wait in a no one wait for your turn to fill out paperwork it's a whole lot easier online and just click here click there in less than 5 minutes you're done. So I really enjoyed filling out the information online and looking forward to football season. Which I will be traveling from Mississippi to watch my grandson play call me  Go Falcons !

Review.Titre: Provide More Credits
Review.Contenu: It was clear and easy to access everything. The only disappointing thing was that whether we donated $35 or $100, or bought multiple items the student only received one credit. We ended up telling family members to buy one item check out, then go back in to buy another, etc...that way the student received all the credits we intended them to have.

Review.Titre: A program saver!
Review.Contenu: The efficiency of money dolly is an attribute that isn't valued enough.  The set up is the most tedious part, but once it's running, it really runs itself. Our team has benefited from the use of money dolly,  and we will use it for future fundraising as well.

Review.Titre: MoneyDolly was very easy to use
Review.Contenu: MoneyDolly was very easy to use.  The only thing for me was there was no option for an amount other than what was listed.  The option of "OTHER" should also be an option so I can choose the amount I want to give.  I participate in several fundraisers throughout the school year.

Review.Titre: Organized over the top!
Review.Contenu: Everything was planned out completed we just had to add the numbers.  It was even planned out how to make sure to show appreciation. The only suggestion is that it kept sending them to the ones who did not want to participate.  There needs to be an opt out selection as well.

Review.Titre: Constructive criticism
Review.Contenu: People were worried the multiple messages automatically sent were spam messages. I had people who wanted to donate smaller amounts or enter their own amount. $35 for the starting donation is a little high. A donation is a donation.... Should go in increments of $5 if you ask me. Also when someone made a $30 donation it still didn't count as a "unit" which didn't make sense to me either when the card was $20 and it counted.

Review.Titre: Very easy for donors to access and to…
Review.Contenu: Very easy for donors to access and to share with potential donors. More options would be nice - beyond cookie dough and jerky.

Review.Titre: I donated in support of Nicolas…
Review.Contenu: I donated in support of Nicolas Sabatini and so did my wife Cheryl Sabatini.  Some how a few people donated in support of someone other then Nicolas Sabatini.

Review.Titre: Simple way to fundraise
Review.Contenu: It was easy to support someone without trying to connect to either pay or receive my discount card. What I don’t like about it, is that I forget I have the discount card. So I am finding it not as easy to remember to use it.

Review.Titre: Needed more donation options
Review.Contenu: Needed more donation options.  I could buy the card for $25 (which I didn't want to do), or the lowest amount to donate otherwise was $35.  There should have been an option to donate a specific amount, and I did not see that as an option.

Review.Titre: Great resource
Review.Contenu: It would’ve been a better outcome for us if it was during everyone’s pay period.

Review.Titre: Fundraiser guidelines, and points system
Review.Contenu: Not sure whether the school set the parameters as guidelines for the products offered to purchase for the fundraiser, or MoneyDolly does but it was pretty limited.It also seemed hard for the girls to earn points toward prizes. Wasn’t sure how that computed. I bought two items and donated money as well and my granddaughter only earned two points.Looking forward to my purchases.

Review.Titre: Moses Whitehurst Review!!  Your Process was Easy enough to…
Review.Contenu: Your Process was Easy enough to Navigate and had the tools in place to make the contribution Easy to make.However there Needs to be a Way to Print My Comments once I make My Contribution.

Review.Titre: It was great working with cal
Review.Contenu: It was great working with cal, he made everything simple. Only one thing I was hoping there were more choices for the items. Overall it was a great experience, and not to mention helpful to my organization. Thank you!

Review.Titre: Convenient
Review.Contenu: It was nice being able to do everything electronically, however the weekly emails following my purchase/donation were too much.  Once you make a purchase/donation, that should be it, not continued requests for more.

Review.Titre: easy to use
Review.Contenu: easy to use, and good product

Review.Titre: So easy!
Review.Contenu: So easy!  I loved that fundraising was made simple. People could pay with a card and I wasn't having to keep track of orders or counting money turned in daily. I did not like not knowing up front that if people made a donation that moneydolly kept a percentage of the donation. I would still highly recommend the service though. Easiest fundraiser I've ever done!

Review.Titre: I don't know how to access the $60…
Review.Contenu: UPDATE:  I was sent a reply explaining how to access my Digital Cards.I don't know how to access the $60 worth of Festival Foods Cards that I bought. Could someone please let me know how to do this?

Review.Titre: The overall process of using the app…
Review.Contenu: The overall process of using the app was easy and the kids were successful implementing it.  The only reason this didn't receive a "5 Star" rating was because the app deducted 20% from donations that were made to students during our fundraiser.  I understand that running apps costs money, but it seems that the fees should only apply to sales made, not charitable donations.

Review.Titre: It was very easy to send out to family…
Review.Contenu: It was very easy to send out to family and friends. Ease of use is always great in a busy family. I would like more items as options to order and for it to reflect correctly if my student got a donation over the $25.

Review.Titre: Money dolly was great…but
Review.Contenu: Money dolly was great. I like selling an item rather then just asking for money. I do not like that MoneyDolly kept sending contacts messages from “me” asking to donate, without asking first or allowing me to shut it off. If I texted someone direct and they donated, we don’t need to ask them three more times. Or if they chose not to, continuing to ask is begging.

Review.Titre: I like the efficiency of listing all…Parent
Review.Contenu: I like the efficiency of listing all contact and be able to track progress.I would prefer a option or other dollar amount for individuals who want to donate a specified amount not advertised.

Review.Titre: The website was easy to use!
Review.Contenu: The website was easy to use!! My only issue is the digital cards don't have a barcode or coupon number on the coupons. It confuses the businesses. They don't know how to record the coupon for their records

Review.Titre: Choices
Review.Contenu: I enjoyed this effort, however I was wondering why there wasn't more choices. We only got two(2) things to pick from. Other than that I enjoyed the experience. No door to door and the children were not handling the money.

Review.Titre: Great donation tool
Review.Contenu: Easy, good experience. I would allow donators to make their name a variable text field instead of just Anonymous or their credit card name for security and better engagement

Review.Titre: I would of like to be able to pay what…
Review.Contenu: I would of like to be able to pay what I wanted instead of preset amounts. I would of also like to of supported more than 1 player. (ex: if you had brothers,) I would like both to pick insread of just 1 kid. just a thought. 1 transaction fir multiple people.

Review.Titre: Easy to use!
Review.Contenu: Easy to use!Request that donation amount be left up to donor. Pre selected amounts are convenient however, not everyone wanted to donate the minimum of $35.

Review.Titre: Buying the cookies was a good…
Review.Contenu: Buying the cookies was a good incentive, but I also think you need to give more points when dollar contributions made.. For example.. when someone contributes $ 100 that amount of money should be worth more than a point???

Review.Titre: The easiness of using the app was…
Review.Contenu: The easiness of using the app was great. The bad part was not being able to buy the sponge candy, I lost about 30 sales just because the sponge candy was unavailable. Items shouldn't sell out for a fundraiser like that. Limited options was a downside as well.

Review.Titre: The app is good and convenient
Review.Contenu: The app is good and convenient. I would like to see a barcode instead of a countdown clock when there are free items offered. Confusing for employees with no barcode.

Review.Titre: It was Wonderful to be able to view…
Review.Contenu: It was Wonderful to be able to view donations as well as our goal I just believe the processing fee was pretty steep.

Review.Titre: My experience was great since I didnt…
Review.Contenu: My experience was great since I didnt have to keep up with paper work and funds it was paid for right there on the Money dolly app fast, easy to use and receive transactions on the account.

Review.Titre: Very easy
Review.Contenu: Very easy. Would love to see you add more cookie dough flavors. Most preferably sugar!

Review.Titre: I wanted to cash apps
Review.Contenu: I wanted to cash app, Zelle, or Venmo some additional funds and that option wasn't available. Can you make that an option in the future?

Review.Titre: The experience was good
Review.Contenu: The experience was good. Work on better deals with the vendors. Nobody goes to a fast food restaurant and just orders a burger to get a free one. Something like a meal with another 1/2 off or something would be better.Also, I  don’t need an account created for me to accept your terms. This is what turns people off. I don’t want my info out and about.

Review.Titre: Great . . . not so great . . .
Review.Contenu: Great - So many choices of places to use it!  Once you're "in", easy to use.The prizes for the kids!Almost always have your phone with you (not like a card)!Good for a whole year!Not so great - People my age don't want to bother (or don't know how) to access/use MoneyDolly.  Unless there is Wi-Fi, can't access it.  Have to get it from the establishment.

Review.Titre: football fundraiser
Review.Contenu: It was very easy to donate and to keep track of who donated and how much! Only thing I would change would be start donations at $20 instead of $35. You could up required units to 20. I have some donors who personally gave me $20 so I combined them to reach the $35 (and over) limit, plus I added the rest to make the fifty. This took away from number of units sold.

Review.Titre: It was easy to add contacts and send…
Review.Contenu: It was easy to add contacts and send request and thanks. I did receive feedback that reminders kept being sent out which annoyed some people.

Review.Titre: Easy fundraising went well
Review.Contenu: It was an easy fundraiser but I think the stats should have included donations not just the number of cards purchased

Review.Titre: Helping my grandson's baseball team…
Review.Contenu: Helping my grandson's baseball team was" the" experience. Since I live 3 hours away from him, I do not get to see him play very often. This was my way of "cheering him and his team mates on" and support the program.

Review.Titre: Very easy ordering process
Review.Contenu: Very easy ordering process. Product is a bit pricey and the donation amounts are high. If not ordering product, maybe donation amounts could be lessened. Overall good experience.

Review.Titre: It was worth the advance
Review.Contenu: It was worth the advance, it's for a great cause and the display of merchandise was excellent.  I was ecstatic I could be of help.

Review.Titre: It is convenient to have the app with…
Review.Contenu: It is convenient to have the app with the offers on my phone. I wish there was a way to transfer one offer to the person picking up the take out. My husband didn't want the app on his phone. The business didn't know how to use the offer but gave us the deal.

Review.Titre: It was overall pretty great
Review.Contenu: It was overall pretty great, however the constant text messages to people who are in my circle was not appreciated

Review.Titre: Football Fundraiser
Review.Contenu: It was for a good cause, my grandson's football program. I liked that the site was easy to navigate and check the progress of the fundraiser. The donations began at $35.00 which is why I gave it 4 stars. I felt that it might be a bit much for some that would have liked to give. Everything is so expensive and budgets are tight.

Review.Titre: The website was extremely easy to…
Review.Contenu: The website was extremely easy to navigate, but the choices available were extremely limited. Please add a few more options.

Review.Titre: process was relatively easy
Review.Contenu: process was relatively easy. Im a Senior Citz and technology is tough for me

Review.Titre: The service was easy to navigate
Review.Contenu: The service was easy to navigate and the work was done for us! The only downfall would be to have it available to be able to navigate multiple accounts.

Review.Titre: We made over $9,000 in just 2 weeks!
Review.Contenu: My fundraising rep (Dravin) was very helpful from the very beginning! He checked in with us along the way and made the process very easy. We made over $9,000 in just 2 weeks!

Review.Titre: The easy to order.the order was…
Review.Contenu: The easy to order.the order was received un damaged .

Review.Titre: It was easy an easy app with one exception
Review.Contenu: It was easy an easy app with the one frustrating point was adding a helper option did not work via link or qr code and there was no fix for it. That's why you got a 4/5.

Review.Titre: To tell you the truth
Review.Contenu: To tell you the truth, this is my first time ordering cookies and donating to this company so I couldn't really give you an answer.

Review.Titre: Liked that the program was accessible…
Review.Contenu: Liked that the program was accessible through the mobile phone however, some parts of the program were a little confusing for the athletes/parents. We supported the Digital Card program but unfortunately I feel the money donation percentage kept by the company is too high to support the $ donations to the team.

Review.Titre: Great experience. Easy and profitable
Review.Contenu: Ian was so helpful through the entire fundraiser. Helpful tips and just helping push me to push the team to try harder. Answered all the questions I had.  We will be back again for sure to do another.

Review.Titre: What made this great for me…
Review.Contenu: What made this great is the fact that my family teams can have a trust worthy platform where we as supporters can do a purchase of donation on line, as well as players not having to worry too much about going from place to place to do sale or collect money.

Review.Titre: Ordering was easy but I would like to…
Review.Contenu: Ordering was easy but I would like to see who has ordered under my child's name and give the individual the decision to remain confidential.

Review.Titre: I think there should be a slot for…
Review.Contenu: I think there should be a slot for sponsors to donate an amount that is affordable to their budget.  Starting at $35 is ok. However, some can only do $20 or less.

Review.Titre: Quick & Easy
Review.Contenu: A great way to help your favorite school and your favorite team to accomplish something great!!!

Review.Titre: I don't think donations should be…
Review.Contenu: I don't think donations should be counted in the overall total. I think donations should be counted separately.

Review.Titre: Add other amount
Review.Contenu: The app need to remove a set amount to give and allow people to give what they’ll want to give. More people would have gave if it wasn’t for them having to give a certain amount. The app should have other amount.

Review.Titre: It was very easy and everyone was polite
Easy use if workers read
Review.Contenu: Easy use excluding worker at place wanted me to exit out of timer and then back in… not sure why.

Review.Titre: Helping out a Neighbor
Review.Contenu: Bought these digital coupons to help out a neighbor's football team.

Review.Titre: Being able to order online
Review.Contenu: Being able to order online.  I did not know about Money Dolly until now.  If I had not known one of the students I selling this product I would not have ordered.  I ordered to help Chastity raise money.

Review.Titre: Fundraising for the team was introduced…
Review.Contenu: Fundraising for the team was introduced by my sister it was interesting and easy too use I was able to see it grow into the accomplishment it has become today ps continue to grow in your productivity

Review.Titre: Easily accessed
Review.Contenu: Easily accessed for selling but I wonder if there is a easier way for older people

Review.Titre: The app was easy to use
Review.Contenu: The app was easy to use. Only wish there were other donation amount option. Not many people wants to donate $20 min.

Review.Titre: This was for our grandson so we donated…
Review.Contenu: This was for our grandson so we donated $145.00. I feel there was a minimum of $20 and some people wanted to donate $10 but could not. I think any amount should be taken.

Review.Titre: Who decides what the minimum donation…
Review.Contenu: Who decides what the minimum donation is set at?

Review.Titre: I thought it was gone be hard but it…
Review.Contenu: I thought it was gone be hard but it was like errthing else#BlessUp

Review.Titre: The company is supporting our kid and…
Review.Contenu: The company is supporting our kid and helping to give the a better education.

Review.Titre: It was quick and easy and more…
Review.Contenu: It was quick and easy and more important trustworthy

Review.Titre: The ease of ordering was good
Review.Contenu: The ease of ordering was good. I only wish there was more options / choices to pick from.

Review.Titre: They responded quickly to my questions
Review.Contenu: MoneyDolly was great about reaching out and resolving my concern.

Review.Titre: Thumbs up
Review.Contenu: It was easy yo donate but the fee to use drove me crazy and the fact that it was a must amount. People should be able to key in their amount.

Review.Titre: Simple Process
Review.Contenu: MoneyDolly worked for our fundraiser for a lot of reasons.  It was an easy fundraiser to set up, and a live person helped me through the process.  The application was easy for our athletes and parents to download, and contacts were easy to add.  The products on the site were good quality and helped us bring in some more dollars for the program.  I will definitely be using MoneyDolly for future fundraisers!

Review.Titre: The Kids!
Review.Contenu: I have donated with moneyDolly in Baton Rouge and D'iberville,the kids really need our help,it's fast and easy to use them,they are Great!

Review.Titre: Orlanndo was great to work with
Review.Contenu: Orlanndo was great to work with. The platform and app is easy to navigate! Unfortunately we didn’t achieve our goal but I am pleased with the overall outcome. We are in a rough spot financially with our kids and their home demographics but I feel like we were successful.

Review.Titre: Very easy to use
Review.Contenu: Donating to my granddaughter's school for her basketball team was very easy. The processing fee was very minimal.

Review.Titre: My success with Money-Dolly!!
Review.Contenu: MoneyDolly was so easy to use, you just provide them with your circle. The circle consists of names and numbers and MoneyDolly did the rest. This was a great fundraiser to participate in, you just set back and wait for your people of circle to do the rest. I would recommend MoneyDolly to anyone looking to raise money for their team or organization. I was very excited and pleased with the outcome.

Review.Titre: Parkway Baseball Money Dolly Fundraiser
Review.Contenu: Roger was super helpful in our fundraiser.  He came out and made a great presentation to our team and was in contact with me throughout the whole fundraiser.  Will definitely use this fundraiser again next year.

Review.Titre: Great Fundraiser
Review.Contenu: Fundraiser was easy! People were able to easily access the app and donate without any face-to-face interaction. Made it easy to get donations from family and friends out of state!

Review.Titre: Very easy to use
Review.Contenu: Very easy to use! Provided options for all levels of support!

Review.Titre: This was my first fundraiser online

Review.Titre: Dear [MoneyDolly Fundraising Team], I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to express my gratitude for my incredible experience with the MoneyDolly fundraiser, particularly in support of our
Review.Contenu: Dear [MoneyDolly Fundraising Team],I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to express my gratitude for my incredible experience with the MoneyDolly fundraiser, particularly in support of our basketball team.From the very beginning, MoneyDolly made the fundraising process not just efficient but also enjoyable. The user-friendly platform allowed our supporters to contribute seamlessly, and the various features made it easy for us to share our team's story and goals. This accessibility played a crucial role in the success of our campaign.What truly set MoneyDolly apart was its ability to foster community around our basketball team. The platform was a virtual hub where coaches, supporters, teammates, and donors gathered to rally behind a shared passion. The engagement and encouragement we received through MoneyDolly were instrumental in boosting team morale and creating a positive atmosphere around our fundraising efforts.The updates and progress reports provided by the MoneyDolly team were invaluable. In real-time, seeing how each contribution brought us closer to our fundraising goal motivated us to keep pushing forward. It kept our supporters informed and helped them understand the tangible impact of their generosity on our team's aspirations.I must commend MoneyDolly for going above and beyond to support our basketball team's journey. Your platform has helped us financially and created lasting memories and connections within our community. Participating in such a well-executed and impactful fundraising campaign has been an honor.As we reflect on the success of this endeavor, we look forward to future collaborations with MoneyDolly and the continued support of our incredible community.Thank you for making our fundraising experience with MoneyDolly genuinely remarkable.
